content: "Singaporean women ‘outperforming’ men in crypto trades, survey reveals"https://cointelegraph.com/news/singaporean-women-outperforming-men-in-crypto-trades-survey-revealsThe dawn of mankind is officially here. A recent poll from Singapore revealed that women managed to outperform men in the manliest games of all - crypto trading:"As per the survey data, 76% of women reported either making money or breaking even on their crypto investments, compared to just 72% of men"Since it looks like the answers were self-reported, there's a chance that women may not be telling the truth, to make themselves look better. But maybe there's something in the female approach to trading that would explain it (i.e. higher risk aversion?).Link to the original survey: https://www.independentreserve.com/blog/news/independent-reserve-cryptocurrency-index-irci-singapore-2023There's a downloadable pdf, they're asking for name/email but don't verify, so you can put anything.
